messages.menu: What do you want to do?

new_plan.write_name: Enter the name of your product. Next, you will specify the quantity. It will look like this: Name Quantity (kg/ml/pcs)

start: Hi, I'm a bot that helps you write and save grocery lists and send them to your contacts, use the buttons to create your first list and send it to your contact.
